name: Hyundai Exter
description: The price of Hyundai Exter, a 5 seater Compact SUV, ranges from Rs. 6.13  - 10.28 Lakh. It is available in 17 variants, with an engine of 1197 cc and a choice of 2 transmissions: Manual and Automatic. Exter comes with 6 airbags. Hyundai Exter has a ground clearance of 185 mm  and is available in 9 colours. Users have reported a mileage of 19.2 to 27.1 kmpl for Exter.
